name: 108 Suitors
description:
Made over a couple of weekends for the British Library's Odyssey Jam, 108 Suitors is a very silly take on one aspect of the Odyssey - Penelope and her 108 suitors, and how being in a house full of men clamouring to be his dad might have affected her son, Telemachus.

Taking gorgeous illustrations from the British Library's online archive and making them look terrible and stupid, 108 Suitors retells a famous story. Sort of.

Contains mild swears.
